Game.Name: Planet Monsters (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl)
Game.plot: Planet Monsters is an Action game, developed by Planet Interactive and published by Titus Software, which was released in 2001.http://www.gamefaqs.com/portable/gbadvance/home/552346.htmlCheat: Level PasswordsInput these at the the password menu.
Game.Notes: There is only one rule with this game - Be the last one standing no matter what! Planet Monsters must confront themselves in eight unique countries each of 5 levels. Four monsters can play at once, so arm yourself with traps, blocks, jelly guns, grenades...and a great sense of humor!
